request.description: Main Login Endpoint

Request for Password Reset.

Value of **q** should be **username** or email.
Confirm password change with token(can be found in email) and new password.

**NB:** Either **username** or **email** should be sent. Not both at once.

item.name: Send Notification To List of User

body.raw:
{
    "type":"send_notification_topic",
 "to" : "/topics/test",
 "collapse_key" : "type_a",
 "notification" : {
     "body" : "Body : Notification",
     "title": "Title : Notification",
     "content_available" : true,
     "sound":"default",
     "priority" : "high",
     "image":"https://www.learndash.com/wp-content/uploads/Notification-Add-on.png"
     
 },
 "data" : {
     "body" : "Body : Data",
     "title": "Title : Data",
     "sound":"default",
     "content_available" : true,
     "priority" : "high",
     "image":"https://metaltechalley.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/data.jpg"
     
 }
}

item.name: Send Notification Using Topic With Condition

body.raw:
{
    "type":"send_notification_topic_condition",
 "condition": "'test' in topics",
 "collapse_key" : "type_a",
 "notification" : {
     "body" : "Body : Notification",
     "title": "Title : Notification",
     "content_available" : true,
     "sound":"default",
     "priority" : "high",
     "image":"https://www.learndash.com/wp-content/uploads/Notification-Add-on.png"
     
 },
 "data" : {
     "body" : "Body : Data",
     "title": "Title : Data",
     "sound":"default",
     "content_available" : true,
     "priority" : "high",
     "image":"https://metaltechalley.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/data.jpg"
     
 }
}
